meanings: with a creak, with a creaking sound.

vlive.korean: [삐걱] '오빠 빨리 마시라고'. [Creaking] Drink up. 듣기 View video 스튜디오 룰루랄라 (Studio LuluLala) : [취중막말] ep.5 숙취해소하는 취중뷰티 꿀팁 대방출!?
소음에 주의해주세요, 삐걱 소리도. - 네. Please be careful of the sound, even the creaks. - Yes. 듣기 View video KIM DONG WAN : 임기홍 임재현 배우
vlive.english: Please be careful of the sound, even the creaks. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 조금 삐걱 거리더라도 여러분들이 잘 봐주시기 바라겠습니다. so I hope you guys still enjoy our broadcast despite our choppy and awkward transitions. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 현빈X유해진 <공조> 스팟 라이브
vlive.english: so I hope you guys still enjoy our broadcast despite our choppy and awkward transitions.
